name: YALG
description:
YALG

YALG is a physics-based puzzle game which will make you sweat pretty hard. Different boxes, ropes, trampolines and machinery will engage your brain. Three game modes: Classic - The main part of game which allows passage to the other two modes - Robot and HARDCORE. Robot mode is based on different machines and their interaction. The last one - HARDCORE, is only for skilled players, few of which can beat it. Achievements, cool music, challenging gameplay and more cool stuff await in YALG!
